item.title: Crimson Wine Group Ltd 10-K
item.description: Crimson Wine Group Ltd, which is in the Beverages [2080] industry, SEC 10-K filing on April 13, 2021 had 25525 (cleaned) words - 600 were utilized for the visualizations. Top Words: company - 451 instances 2020 - 298 instances wine - 204 instances 2019 - 196 instances financial - 191 instances See the parsed data used in the visualization here.
